question: In each question, an incomplete statement (Stem) followed by fillers is given. Pick out the best one which can complete incomplete stem correctly and meaningfully The weather outside was extremely pleasant and hence we decided to ......
options: utilise our time in watching the television
refrain from going out for a morning walk
enjoy a morning ride in the open
remain seated in our rooms in the bungalow
correct_answer: enjoy a morning ride in the open
